front.title: IEEE Standard for Electrical Safety Practices in Electrolytic Cell Line Working Zones

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Means of safeguarding personnel while operating or maintaining equipment located in electrolytic cell line working zones are provided. Included are related requirements for equipment and electrical conductor installations.
